rooms.description: A welcoming entry with decorative elements and a small waiting area, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy.
An open-plan space combining the living area and kitchen. The design includes a spacious island counter with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Integrated dining area within the living space, featuring a large table and seating that aligns with Vastu's south-east direction for prosperity.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony, floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern wall for sunlight and energy balance.
Second bedroom with a balcony overlooking the garden, windows on the east for morning light and positive energy.
Third bedroom with a balcony featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance the bohemian aesthetic and light intake.
Fourth bedroom with an adjoining balcony, designed to maximize privacy while maintaining the open feel of the villa.
Primary bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed with natural stone and wood finishes for a bohemian touch.
Secondary bathroom shared between other bedrooms, featuring minimalist design and eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.description: A large, inviting door leading into the villa, designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
Large windows in the living room offering unobstructed views and abundant natural light, promoting a bohemian atmosphere.
Each bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural lighting and enhance the bohemian aesthetic.
